name: MMM (-, -, +)
description:
Description: A game where a catgirl and a foxgirl use the magnetic power of friendship to overcome the hardships of the space.

Objective: At least one player has to reach the portal to advance.

Controls: 

Gamepad:

B = Positive Charge (+) 

X = Negative Charge (-)

Keyboard:

C =  Positive Charge (+)

Z = Negative Charge (-)

Backspace = Reset
